title: Rebrain Platform
description:
A mechanism for connecting highly skilled workers abroad with businesses operating in Greece. Each user can be registered as a Scientists / Experts / Researchers (S.E.R) or as a business and have the respective permissions and features. Implemented with CPT's of WordPress, ACF. It contains interactivity with ESCO's API.
*Only coding, no design.

title: Support Greek Music
description:
Crowdfunding platform to aid and practically bind the creators’ copyright, during a deafeningly resonant period, caused by the COVID-19 pandemic. My contribution to that project was the front-end development.
*Only coding, no design.

title: Ampelokipi - Menemeni
description:
A multilanguage portal for Ampelokipi - Menemeni Municipality. The citizen can apply online for problems or questions, connected with TaxisNet, or simply log in. Implementation of custom search functionality with AJAX filters to improve user experience.
*Only coding, no design.

title: HEDNO (ΔΕΔΔΗΕ) Chatbot
description:
Hellenic Electricity Distribution Network Operator's chatbot landing page.

*Only coding, no design.

title: Crowdpolicy events
description:
Crowdpolicy's events with AJAX filtering with pagination. Built with WordPress' CPT, ACF.
*Only coding, no design.

title: Web app for Image Similarity using Siamese Neural Network
description: My thesis was to implement a Siamese Neural Network using the VGG19 model, pre-trained on ImageNet to calculate the match of a query image through a dataset of images. To find the similarity, I used a contrastive loss function and a Euclidean distance. You will find my implementation on a web app for this purpose on the below link of Github.

title: Todo App
description: Classic Todo app developed on React(CRA) as a practice project. You can add, edit and delete a task, as well as, to mark it as completed with one click.
